message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a competitive price of $14,000. I believe this product will be highly beneficial for you.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but your price is a little high for me. Would you consider $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your position, $10,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $12,000. This is my final offer.
